start.text:
💼 This bot will guide you to apply to one of our available jobs.

Send /jobs to see the available jobs.

help.text:
ℹ️ This bot will guide you to apply to one of our fictitious available jobs.

It provides a mini app with a web interface for a better experience for fulfilling the forms.

You may want to click on the button “Available jobs” or send /jobs to see the available jobs.

jobs.text:
💼 Here are the available jobs.

Click on one of the buttons to open the form.
